In the UI filters page, switch to the advanced tab, add multiple filters, select all of them at once and click on 'remove'.  Notice that the remove button doesn't work.  Selecting individual filters and clicking on remove does work.  Please see screenshot and error log file for more details.  Driver used: TPTP-4.2.0-200605100934

From the error log, it seems to generate an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
